name: neko-atom-ui
description: Clean and customizable Atom theme with neko stylings

colorTheme.description: Set the main color used throughout the theme

colorThemeHex.description: Set the main color color by hex value (Use #rrggbb)

colorBackgroundHex.description: Set the primary background color color by hex value (Use #rrggbb)

overlayColor.description: Set the contrasting color to your custom color

fontSize.description: Set the global font size for this theme.

useSyntax.description: Override the gutter, background, and selection colours
